comment: Fruity very malty on the front end with light smiley finish 86$ a bottle
Carmel, peat, earthiness, black pepper, hint of smoke.
I smell some iced black tea.
This vatted malt recreation displays honey malt, peat smoke, peppery spice, all with a medium finish.

Toffee and fruitcake on the nose.
Vanilla, Oak, Spice, Caramel on the palate.
complex nose of toffee, pears, apples, citrus. zesty palate. Spicy finish
